steps.title: Welcome
steps.content: Welcome to Learner Script an efficient reporting engine for Moodle.

steps.title: Switch Dashboard
steps.content: Click here to switch from one dashboard to another dashboard.

steps.title: Add Widgets/Tiles
steps.content: Click here to add a new widget/tile to dashboard.

steps.title: Add New Report
steps.content: Click here to add new report.

steps.title: Add New Dashboard
steps.content: Click here to add new dashboard.

steps.title: Switch Role
steps.content: Click here to see the report or Dashboard according to the user role.

steps.title: Date Filter
steps.content: Select your custom filter to filter the dashboard or a report according to week, month, year, custom and all.

steps.title: Export Report
steps.content: Click here to export the report.
